titleStmt.title: The judgment of God shewed upon one John [Faustus] doctor in divinity. Tune Fortune my foe

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A.M.W.O. and Tho. Thackeray at the Angel in Duck-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Full title, place of publication, and imprint date from Wing.
Verse - "All Christian men give ear a while to me,".
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
